ability.name: Subtle Relocation
ability.flavor: You call on the void to swallow and spit out an ally.
ability.trigger: The target starts their turn, moves, or is force moved.

metadata.flavor: You call on the void to swallow and spit out an ally.

effects.effect: You teleport the target up to a number of squares equal to your Reason score. If the target moves to trigger this ability, you can teleport them at any point during the move.
You teleport the target up to a number of squares equal to twice your Reason score instead.
